data.strFullDescription:
VRidge connects your mobile device to your PC, transforming it into a powerful SteamVR-compatible virtual reality headset. It will then stream SteamVR apps to your mobile device as a high-performance video with full head and controller tracking. All you need is a mobile or cardboard VR viewer to enjoy the experience!
 
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2677750/extras/connect-bg.png?t=1738623148[/img]

[h2]Getting started[/h2]
[olist]
[*]Install RiftCat client application on your computer via Steam.
[*]Install VRidge on your mobile device and place it inside your mobile VR viewer.
[*]Launch both apps.
[*]Follow the built-in instructions in the RiftCat application to connect them via WiFi.
[*]Enjoy!
[/olist]

[h2]Test your setup first[/h2]
Try out your [b]VRidge hardware setup[/b] with the [b]Demo version[/b] to ensure everything works correctly before making a purchase.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2677750/extras/lab_cat.png?t=1738623148[/img]
data.strSnippet: 使用VRidge使你的電腦將你的流動裝置視為功能強大的PC VR頭戴式裝置。
